attributes.action: Theresa May should openly condemn Donald Trump's ban on Muslims
attributes.additional_details: We strongly demand tha Mrs May openly, and in no unequivocal words, condemn these actions and clarify her position. We would like to remind Mrs May of the British values that we all admire and the whole world gives example of, as otherwise, she will be seen as Trump's partner in this action and not having any respect of the British people's sentiments and their values that they are proud of.
attributes.background:
Donald Trump's hate speaches during the election campaign and after taking the office have created a lot of hate and extremism in the society. Mr Trump has gone to the extreme in his anti Muslim policies and disregarded the civilised law and human rights. 
.
